channel.title: How would i go about adding commands
channel.description:
rite hi u all may think im a real noob now cues i dont know how to add a command i would like to know a *::jail command *and*::unjail command*
if any body could help me with this like send me command code and show me where its put plz plz do help
ty MANIHATEYOU

item.title: How would i go about adding commands
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

i am not sure if it is 317 either here is the jail command for 317 tho :s i am not sure if its everything, but most :s

 if (command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights > 1) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                        p.toX = 2933;
			p.toY = 3285;
			p.action = 1;
                        p.sM(
                                "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
			sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
                }
            }
